import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete inventory actions by IDs"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/inventory/actions/ids"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes multiple inventory actions by their unique identifiers.

**Note**: This API is marked as deprecated (v1.0). Use this for targeted deletion of specific actions.

**Prerequisites**:
- **InventoryActionIds**: Use [POST /api/v1.0/inventory/actions/query](/docs/api/inventory/query-inventory-actions) to find action IDs to delete.

**Workflow**:
1. Query actions to identify which ones to delete
2. Extract `InventoryActionId` values from the response
3. Submit the array of IDs to this endpoint

**Caution**: Deleted actions cannot be recovered. This is a soft delete operation.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Array of inventory action IDs to delete.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"example":["fc45a960-d0f5-42a8-ac25-075e46f70074","bd56b071-e1f6-53b9-bd36-186f57f81185"]}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Inventory actions deleted successfully.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response envelope for batch deleting inventory actions.","allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Response envelope returned after successfully deleting multiple resources in bulk. Based on C# `ListDeleteResponse` from `Spark.Shared.Models.Responses`.","properties":{"Ids":{"type":"array","description":"Array of UUIDs for the deleted resources","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"UserToken":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Authenticated session identifier"},"RequestDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the API processed the request"},"ExecutionTime":{"type":"number","format":"double","description":"Server-side execution time in milliseconds"},"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","description":"HTTP status code (typically 200 for successful delete)","example":200},"Message":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Optional informational message"},"ServerName":{"type":"string","description":"Application node that processed the request"},"ProcessId":{"type":"integer","description":"Internal process identifier for diagnostics"},"OperationId":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Trace identifier for log correlation"}},"required":["StatusCode"],"title":"ListDeleteResponse"}],"properties":{"Ids":{"type":"array","description":"Array of InventoryActionIds that were deleted.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}},"title":"InventoryActionBatchDeleteResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
